text: Manfred Thierry Mugler (; 21 December 1948 - 23 January 2022) was a French fashion designer. He was born in Strasbourg, France. Mugler was openly gay. He was known for designing Demi Moore's dress from Indecent Proposal. He also created a line of fragrances and perfumes called "Angel". Mugler died on 23 January 2022 at his home in Paris, one month after his 73rd birthday. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Gay men Category:LGBT fashion designers Category:French LGBT people Category:French fashion designers Category:Bodybuilders Category:People from Strasbourg
title: Thierry Mugler
